Posts.EditableText:
Hey,
 
 I know under the system requirements it says you need...

     * Windows XP 
     * Windows Vista 
     * Windows 2000
             or
     * Windows 7

 I was wondering, is Quest ever going to be compatible with Mac computers? I ask because I have a few of my friends who would love to play my games, but they can't because it wont run on Mac computers. I think that would be a major step up for Quest, if it could be compatible with Mac. If there's a way, I'm sure you'll find it Alex. If not ah well, it's just a thought.

Posts.EditableText: It's unlikely that Quest will appear for Mac any time soon, though it may eventually be possible when everything is converted to .net, if I can make it run through Mono. However you can play games online using a Mac - if you upload your game to www.textadventures.co.uk, the "Play online" feature works on Windows, Mac and Linux.
Posts.HTML:
It's unlikely that Quest will appear for Mac any time soon, though it may eventually be possible when everything is converted to .net, if I can make it run through Mono.

However you can play games online using a Mac - if you upload your game to www.textadventures.co.uk, the "Play online" feature works on Windows, Mac and Linux.
